tags.name: my-component
tags.description:
My custom component. Here is its [documentation](https://github.com/microsoft/vscode-custom-data/blob/master/samples/webcomponents/src/components/my-component/docs.md).
Use it like this:
```html
<my-component type='text'></my-component>
<my-component
  type='color'
  color='#00bb00'
></my-component>
```

attributes.name: type
attributes.description:
Type of the component. Can be either `text` or `color`.
If type is `color`, it needs to have a `color` attribute as well.

attributes.name: color
attributes.description: Color of the component. Only applies when `type` is `color`.
